author: hship
msg: Update the Tapestry Tutorial document with recent changes (particularly to the page naming standard).
Put a larger demonstration Vlib database in VlibBeans.
Add more comments to the Vlib and VlibBeans projects.

author: hship
msg: Tapestry design document:  Better discussion of transient, persistent, dynamic page properties.

author: hship
msg: Add and correct documentation in Vlib and VlibBeans.

author: hship
msg: Make AbstractApplication.constructService() be a protected, not public, method.

author: hship
msg: Allow book and person detail pages to be bookmarked (using a new service).
Use a cookie to store the user's e-mail, providing a default on subsequent logins.
